name: Fallen Cube (itch)
description:
In a far future world, simple robots have little value in society. As the most basic of bots (a literal cube) you must build up power and attempt to overthrown your robotic overlords! Demo includes four unique areas, made for Metroidvania Month 5.
Control+R -> Reset Game
